I understand that a good unit tester ought not have a shared test=

fixture and also that as few of the tests ought to test an actual
database=
 as possible. But for those tests which indeed must test the
DAOs rather th=
an a mock DAO, I was wondering if there was some
alternative to biting the =
bullet and rebuilding the SessionFactory
once per test. Or is this a case w=
here it is warranted to tolerate the
smell of a SessionFactory built once p=
er TestCase?
